data.convo: Okay , next question . If Eric asked you out on a date , what would you say ? Duh ! I would say yes ! Eric is the most popular kid in school ! Okay , my turn . What would you do if you won the lottery ? Let â€™ s see ... If I won the lottery , I would buy two tickets for a trip around the world . If you buy me a ticket I will go with you for sure ! My dad will freak out if I even mention a trip like that ! Alright this is a good one . What would your mom say if you told her you are going to get married ? If I told her that , she would faint and have me committed !
